item.title: Quick Intro to Quantum Computers
item.description: Today, I’m gonna quickly go through one of the most trending topics – Quantum Computers. What is a quantum computer ? Quantum Computers are devices using a quantum logic for general purpose computing. Unlike electronic computers (or traditional computers), the object quantum computing uses to store data is qubits(or quantum bits), which use quantum algorithms for data manipulation. Quantum computing is the use of quantum-mechanical phenomena such as superposition and entaglement to perform computation.
